permafrost.tundra.server.security

Class GroupHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.security.GroupHelper

  • public final class GroupHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of convenience methods for working with Integration Server groups.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private GroupHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void create(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new group with the given name unless it already exists.
      static boolean exists(java.lang.String name)
      Returns true if a group with the given name exists.
      static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group findOrCreate(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the group with the given name if it exists, otherwise creates a new group with the given name.
      static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] findOrCreate(java.lang.String[] names)
      Returns the groups with the given names if they exists, otherwise creates new groups with the given names.
      static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group get(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the group with the given name.
      static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] get(java.lang.String[] names)
      Returns the list of groups that correspond to the given list of names.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(java.lang.String name)
                   throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Creates a new group with the given name unless it already exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The group name.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the group cannot be created.

      • findOrCreate

        public static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group findOrCreate(java.lang.String name)
                                                throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the group with the given name if it exists, otherwise creates a new group with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The group name.
        Returns:
        Either the existing group with the given name, or a newly created group with the name.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If the group cannot be created.

      • findOrCreate

        public static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] findOrCreate(java.lang.String[] names)
                                                  throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns the groups with the given names if they exists, otherwise creates new groups with the given names.
        Parameters:
        names - The group names.
        Returns:
        Either the existing groups with the given names, or newly created groups with the names.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If a group cannot be created.

      • exists

        public static boolean exists(java.lang.String name)
        Returns true if a group with the given name exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The group name.
        Returns:
        True if a group with the given name exists.

      • get

        public static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group get(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the group with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - The group name.
        Returns:
        The group with the given name, or null if no group with the given name exists.

      • get

        public static com.wm.app.b2b.server.Group[] get(java.lang.String[] names)
        Returns the list of groups that correspond to the given list of names.
        Parameters:
        names - The list of group names.
        Returns:
        The list of groups that correspond to the given list of names.
